Class CSView

  • java.lang.Object
    • CSView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class CSView
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener

    CSView

    This file creates the main menu for the game.

    This is the View file for our game, with all the button functionality.

    Since:
    2018-1-22
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    William Galapon, Joshua Ong, Jeffrey Tse

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton back
      Button that lets you go back to the main menu.
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton connclient
      Button that lets you connect as the client.
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton connserver
      Button that lets you connect as the server.
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton credits
      Button that takes you to the credits screen.
      (package private) javax.swing.JFrame frame
      Frame to house the panels.
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton instructions
      Button that takes you to the instructions screen.
      (package private) CSViewPanel panel
      Panel that extends the functionality of the JPanel.
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton play
      Play Button that leads to the Server/Client buttons.
      (package private) javax.swing.JButton quit
      Button that exits the game, closing the frame.
      (package private) javax.swing.Timer timer
      Timer for repainting the menu to make the game run 60 FPS.
